main_definition: Skirts can refer to various things, including a clothing item for women or girls that covers the lower part of the body, or they can be used as an idiom referring to avoiding responsibilities or tasks.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A garment worn by women and girls covering the waist downwards, typically with a flared or straight shape.
meanings_and_examples.example: She twirled around in her pink pleated skirt at the dance.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To avoid doing something, often related to responsibilities or tasks.
meanings_and_examples.example: The student tried to skirt around his homework by spending more time on games.
